summary: Category Seed Schema Testing (L1->L2->L3->L4 hierarchy) completed successfully. Backend seed endpoint works correctly with idempotent behavior. Admin Categories UI displays hierarchy preview panel with L1-L6 levels. Home page left category block renders Emlak module with L1 root + L2 children (Konut, Ticari Alan, Arsa) with listing counts.
seed_data_creation: Real estate standard hierarchy seeded via POST /api/admin/categories/seed/real-estate-standard
context_for_next_testing_agent: Category hierarchy fully seeded: Emlak -> (Konut, Ticari Alan, Arsa) -> (Satılık, Kiralık, Günlük Kiralık) -> (Daire, Müstakil Ev, Köşk & Konak, Bina, Çiftlik Evi). Admin Categories page shows hierarchy preview panel (L1→L6). Home page displays L1/L2 categories with listing counts in card format.

details.response_format: ok, country, module, created_count, reused_count, items

components_verified: Category table with GÖRSEL, AD, SLUG, ÜLKE, MODÜL columns
L1 root: Emlak with blue card style
L2 children: Konut (0), Ticari Alan (0), Arsa (0) with counts

mocked_apis.doping_options: Static backend list - payment gateway NOT integrated
